body:
As expected of someone who robbed her daughter bf i would say, she indeed deserve happiness from all of that useless shit (shitty baba & shitty hubby) happened in her past, but not by doing that to her daughter.
Well they said that peoples are inclined to band together with someone that have similarity like shitheads with shitheads and so on, i guess it's good that she left the home at last chap.

anyone got the numbers for all the parts? cant wait for all parts to be translated. Also damn she literally became a cum sponge after finding her husband was cheating how the fuck did she not get aids or pregnant. Did it say she got ran through by 30 guys on page 38? i mean i feel bad for the daughter imagine when she finds out her mom was doing all this shit plus now currently in the present she fucking her boyfriend
In short: Chapter 1,2 and 4 are happening in present. Chapter 3(this chapter) is her past and happening years before.

Huh so her past was that hardcore. All the scenes here was in her past when she discovered that her husband cheating on her. The first 2 chapters are happening years after this when her daugther is already older and she met her daugther boyfriend, then she choose him above all. Seems like she stoped doing it too and just wanted to meet with someone in first chapter, but her daugther boyfriend take a move on her because of that.
So this is her past? Damn shes disgusting. I'm amazed she doesn't have disease. Gross
Don’t know Japanese but maybe she stopped cheating after the old lady died? Just guessing.

Lol you dumbasses get off a married woman cheating and then remember she probably fucked other people and get angry? Actual betas. She already clearly chose her daughters boyfriend above all else, since he seems to be the only one to tire her out.
